summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Sewerage Utility; authorizing the construction of a sewer in West Lee Street from Elliott Avenue West to approximately 170 feet northeasterly thereof, and certain other streets, avenues and easements, and the acquisition of the necessary right of way therefor, as part of the additions, betterments and extensions to said utility contemplated by Plan and System Ordinance No. 84391; making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund as an advance to capital account therefor; repealing Ordinance No. 85537, and ratifying and confirming acts heretofore performed in connection therewith.
